content.yext/answer: As of today, March 12, 2020, the Dime Community Bank Melville branch located at One Huntington Quadrangle, Suite 1N06, Melville NY 11747 has reopened, and will operate at full capacity under normally scheduled hours, opening at 8:30am. And, as always, you can access your accounts any time at www.dime.com on your desktop or mobile device, or through the Dime mobile app. Thank you, Your Dime Community Bank Team
